Uses of Class
adept.common.Corpus

Packages that use Corpus
adept.common Provides common data structures for use in the ADEPT framework, including the input Document and its TokenStream containing every Token, and the output HltContentContainer containing multiple kinds of annotations, such as EntityMention and Relation, which are based on the Chunk class. 
adept.io Provides I/O classes that handle reading/write files in different formats, including LDC Gigaword Corpus, ERE, CoNLL, email and plain text. 
adept.restapi Provides interfaces for accessing DEFT algorithms as RESTful services 
adept.utilities Provides utility classes and functions for creating ADEPT Document objects, for tokenization, regression test, benchmark test, profiler, command-line application and file conversions.
